name: Arthurius
description: Really smart but grades are pretty low, which is surprising because he should be able to read his professor's minds during a test. Maybe he chooses not to. He's also super-friendly and kind.

name: Fantasia
description: Shy and likes to oplay with talking raccoons.

name: Obsidian
description: No one knows for sure who obsidian really is. This boy just popped out of nowhere one day. Many people suspect that he's always been around, silently staring at everyone.
